org.threadly.concurrent.future

Class ListenableFutureTask<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<T>
      • org.threadly.concurrent.future.ListenableFutureTask<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of future implementation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<T>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<T>, CallableContainerInterface<T>, ListenableFuture<T>, ListenableRunnableFuture<T>, RunnableContainerInterface

    public class ListenableFutureTask<T>
extends java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<T>
implements ListenableRunnableFuture<T>, CallableContainerInterface<T>, RunnableContainerInterface

    This is a future which can be executed. Allowing you to construct the future with the interior work, submit it to an executor, and then return this future.

    Since:
    1.0.0

      • ListenableFutureTask

        public ListenableFutureTask(boolean recurring,
                    java.lang.Runnable task)
        Constructs a runnable future with a runnable work unit.
        Parameters:
        recurring - boolean to indicate if this task can run multiple times, and thus must be reset after each run
        task - runnable to be run

        Constructs a runnable future with a runnable work unit.
        Parameters:
        recurring - boolean to indicate if this task can run multiple times, and thus must be reset after each run
        task - runnable to be run
        result - result to be provide after run has completed

      • addListener

        public void addListener(java.lang.Runnable listener)
        Description copied from interface: ListenableFuture
        Add a listener to be called once the future has completed. If the future has already finished, this will be called immediately. The listener from this call will execute on the same thread the result was produced on, or on the adding thread if the future is already complete. If the runnable has high complexity, consider passing an executor in for it to be ran on.
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface ListenableFuture<T>
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to run when the computation is complete

      • addListener

        public void addListener(java.lang.Runnable listener,
               java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
        Description copied from interface: ListenableFuture
        Add a listener to be called once the future has completed. If the future has already finished, this will be called immediately.
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface ListenableFuture<T>
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to run when the computation is complete
        executor - executor the listener should be ran on

      • addCallback

        public void addCallback(FutureCallback<? super T> callback)
        Description copied from interface: ListenableFuture
        Add a FutureCallback to be called once the future has completed. If the future has already finished, this will be called immediately. The callback from this call will execute on the same thread the result was produced on, or on the adding thread if the future is already complete.
        Specified by:
        addCallback in interface ListenableFuture<T>
        Parameters:
        callback - the callback to run when the computation is complete

        Description copied from interface: ListenableFuture
        Add a FutureCallback to be called once the future has completed. If the future has already finished, this will be called immediately. The callback from this call will execute on the same thread the result was produced on, or on the adding thread if the future is already complete. If the callback has high complexity, consider passing an executor in for it to be called on.
        Specified by:
